content: Nukes are the only answer to combat with Communist China. And we'd better hit completely, and early, preferably with Neutron bombs. Our government is hoplessly stuck in force reduction mode, and that is going to kill us in the long run, unless some of those so-called alien technologies go a lot further that we know. Figuratively speaking, no high-tech fighter can stand up to a 1000:1 force ratio, which could happen.
reply: Nukes are the only answer to combat with Communist China. And we'd better hit completely, and early, preferably with Neutron bombs. Figuratively speaking, no high-tech fighter can stand up to a 1000:1 force ratio, which could happen.
title: RAND Study: US loses future war with China

content: When the world only had to worry about the US and the USSR Mutual Assured Destruction using nukes, Chairman Mao Tse Tung was quoted as saying, "let the US and Russia destroy themselves. There will STILL be enough Chinese left alive to repopulate."

title: RAND Study: US loses future war with China
